rooms.description: Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows facing the south for maximum sunlight and adherence to Vastu Shastra. It serves as a central hub connecting to the dining area.
Adjacent to the living room, designed with open space and minimalistic decor in line with Brutalist aesthetics, featuring concrete exposed finishes.
Multi-functional space for joint family gatherings, integrating subtle elements of both communal seating and private corners. Windows align with Vastu principles to enhance energy flow.
Modern, functional kitchen designed in a Brutalist style with exposed concrete walls and high-quality cabinetry, ensuring efficient workflow with an island counter.
Dedicated library space for reading and study, featuring wall-to-wall bookshelves and ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows, designed in a stark minimalist style reflective of Brutalism.
Comfortable guest bedroom integrated within the ground floor layout for privacy, with window views that follow Vastu guidelines.
Primary ground floor bathroom designed to serve both living and guest areas with efficient fixtures and ventilation.
